title: Kiss the Boys Goodbye: How the United States Betrayed Its Own POWs in Vietnam
description: The bestselling expose of a major political scandal--in the tradition of All the President's Men and Spycatcher. The story of a five-year investigation by two award-winning journalists, Kiss the Boys Goodbye reveals heartbreaking evidence of POWs abandoned in Vietnam, of official obstruction and missing files, censored testimony and thinly veiled threats from government sources. 16 pages of photographs.
author: William H. Stevenson
